artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Hiranoya Chōemon
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame} | publisher\'s seal: 長 {Chō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
text: Center sheet of a triptych. Related to the play Hakatagoma meibutsu banashi 博多高麗名物噺, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1815, tenth month.
title: Actor Matsumoto Kōshirō V as Genkai no Nadaemon
